headline: Donald Trump Is the AI Bubble’s Best Friend
summary: Tech’s strength has people talking about bubbles once again—and not without evidence. Consider: The top 10 companies in the S&P 500 today are more overvalued than they were during the dot-com era.

headline: Head of $8 Billion Wealth Firm Has His Eye on These 3 Major Market Disruptors
summary: Aureus Asset Management, an $8 billion registered investment advisor in Boston, has been recommending alternative investments to clients since its founding 20 years ago.  Then in 2005, when Karen Firestone and David Scudder were launching Aureus, you joined them.

headline: Citi Raised the Firm’s PT on Applied Materials (AMAT), Kept a Buy Rating
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the Most Undervalued High Quality Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On July 7, Citi raised the firm’s price target on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) from $190 to $220, while maintaining a Buy rating on the stock. The firm also added the company to its US focus list, […]
